DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , parallel , double-masked , placebo-controlled , multicenter outpatient study compare tasimelteon placebo treatment subject Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) . The study three phase : pre-randomization phase , randomization phase , open-label extension phase . The pre-randomization phase comprise screen visit subject 's initial eligibility evaluate . The randomization phase comprise 8-week double-masked segment . Subjects meet entry criterion study enter randomization phase . During phase , subject ask take either 20 mg tasimelteon placebo 8 week double-masked fashion . At end 8-week double-masked phase , subject complete 8-week treatment phase offer enroll 52-week open-label extension subject receive daily dose 20 mg tasimelteon .
